title: Stylish Inner Mongolia Escape in the Heart of Ordos
description: Fall in love with the breathtaking beauty of Inner Mongolia with a stay at the charming Crowne Plaza Ordos, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned overlooking Jiari Park. Experience authentic Cantonese food with Mongolian flavours at YingBin Chinese Restaurant, plunge into the sparkling pool or rejuvenate body and mind at the fitness centre. When it's time to explore, find yourself moments from Hua Lian Shopping Mall and Genghis Khan Tomb.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Ordos, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1 Yingbin Road, Etuoke West Street, Erdos City 017000, China
